nodes.text: Krakin was an individual who established the cantina Krakin's Alehouse on the planet Cularin. During the time of the Clone Wars, a number of individuals claimed that Krakin had been a Rodian, a Sullustan, or a Zabrak.
Krakin was created by Morrie Mullins and received a brief mention in Remember When, an article that was added to Wizards.com in 2005 as part of the Living Force campaign.
